name: George Third & Son. 2006.  Advertisement in "First Class Health Care"
description:
DESCRIPTION
Weight and materials for constructing a coal loading solo, from advertisement of George Third & Son on page 15 of Volume 3, Issue 6 of Construction Business.

FULL CITATION
George Third & Son. 2006.  Advertisement in "First Class Health Care".  Construction Business 3(6): 15.  http://www.accesshealthabbotsford.ca/pdf/AHAConstruction_BusinessOct2006.pdf (accessed December 14, 2009).
